Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Increases transparency in cooperative housing corporations
Summary: Increases transparency in cooperative housing corporations by giving shareholders more rights to information of the co-op and limiting the powers of management companies and boards.
LawCode: Add Art 9 Title 1 §139, Title 2 §§140 - 144, Title 3 §§150 - 154, Coop Corps L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the cooperative corporations law, in relation to increasing transparency in cooperative housing corporations
